name: catastropika
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user, Pikachu, surrounds itself with the maximum amount of electricity using its Z-Power and pounces on its target with full force.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user, Pikachu, surrounds itself with the maximum amount of electricity using its Z-Power and pounces on its target with full force.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user, Pikachu, surrounds itself with the maximum amount of electricity using its Z-Power and pounces on its target with full force.
